reviews.text: It’s an ok station it could get cleaned more and the down side is no wheelchair access and no toilets
The station is not staffed, so you have to get your ticket on the train. Also if you are getting a northbound train there is no wheel chair access. Only stairs.

Not a manned station, so mobile tickets are one of your only options. The station is also a hotspot for troublesome youths and nothing gets cleaned. Cigarettes and alcohol bottles/cans everywhere. As stated in another review there is no wheelchair access to platform 1.
